en.description:
🪙 *Crypto Monitor Bot*

Basic cryptocurrency monitoring solution for tracking prices and setting alerts.

📊 *Core Features:*
• Real-time prices via Binance API
• Price change notifications
• Multi-coin monitoring
• 4 language support

🔔 *Alert System:*
• Custom price thresholds
• Adjustable check intervals
• Instant notifications
• Multiple coin tracking

💎 *VIP Features:*
• More coins (5 vs 2)
• Faster updates (1min vs 10min)
• Lower thresholds (5% vs 10%)
• Priority support

⚠️ *Disclaimer: For informational purposes only. Not financial advice. Trade responsibly.*
en.how_to_use_text:
📖 *How to Use Crypto Monitor Bot*

🔍 *Check Prices:*
1. Click 'Check Price' button
2. Enter cryptocurrency symbol (e.g., BTCUSDT)
3. Get real-time price from Binance

📈 *Set Up Monitoring:*
1. Go to 'Monitoring' menu
2. Add coins you want to track (2 max for Free, 5 for VIP)
3. Set price thresholds (10% min for Free, 5% for VIP)
4. Set check interval (10min min for Free, 1min for VIP)

⚙️ *Configure Settings:*
1. Open 'Settings' menu
2. View current configuration
3. Change language or upgrade to VIP

🌐 *Change Language:*
• Available in EN/UK/RU/BY
• Access via Settings menu
